Property Location
When you stay at Bonville Lodge Bed & Breakfast in Bonville, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Coffs Harbour Butterfly House. This 4-star guesthouse is within the region of Coffs Harbour Golf Club and Coffs Harbour Racecourse.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a seasonal outdoor pool.

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours. Free self parking is available onsite.
